title: - About us -
description: ten20 is being built by a distributed team of talented people from around the world

items.name: Alex Birkett
items.title: Founder
items.description: Alex is a software engineer turned entrepreneur. Alex founded ten20 and is assisting XiaoLei with the code.

items.name: Daniel Butler
items.title: Creative advisor
items.label: Daniel was contracted to provide the ten20 brand and visual direction

items.name: Liu XiaoLei
items.title: developer
items.description: XiaoLei is a a software engineer contracted to work on ten20. We love XiaoLei's talent, attitude and work ethic. XiaoLei is a fan of unix philosophy of simplicity. He is experienced on front-end technologies and the node.js framework.

items.name: Lyn Braas
items.title: designer
items.description: Lyn is studying Graphic Design at Mediacollege Amsterdam worked on ten20 while interned at Komodo in the summer of 2013. Lyn designed Ten20's location history feature.
